channel.title: Method to Display Nearby Objects
channel.description:
Alright, so I'm trying to create 'phases' in-game, so that some players are able to be seen to some players, and others aren't. Does anybody know the method that updates nearby players?
I have searched around my classes, and can't seem to find it. o.O

item.title: Method to Display Nearby Objects
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:7, topic:271515”][quote author=noobie22 link=topic=358277.msg2735849#msg2735849 date=1239050295]
Then search google, search bar etc.
[/quote]I have, and no results are there. This is what the help section is for.

At least my question isn’t “i cant find meh client.jaba where is it please admin for you”[/quote]
Fixt.

Read full topic

item.title: Method to Display Nearby Objects
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:4, topic:271515”]I was only trying to help, you’re probably going to have to make your own Method.[/quote]Umm, no. There’s a method somewhere that updates players that are around a certain Client object.

Read full topic

item.title: Method to Display Nearby Objects
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“noobie22, post:2, topic:271515”]updateAppearance = true;

updateAppearance = false;

Those should help you. You should add those to your misc.random, I’m not sure if it’ll work but it’s a start eh?[/quote]Method. Not variables stating that an update should happen soon.

Read full topic

item.title: Method to Display Nearby Objects
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

updateAppearance = true;
updateAppearance = false;

Those should help you. You should add those to your misc.random, I’m not sure if it’ll work but it’s a start eh?

Read full topic
